# isPlaybackBufferEmpty

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether playback has consumed all buffered media and that playback will stall or end.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var isPlaybackBufferEmpty: Bool { get }
```

## Determining buffering status

- **isPlaybackLikelyToKeepUp**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item will likely play through without stalling.
- **isPlaybackBufferFull**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the internal media buffer is full and that further I/O is suspended.
